## CameraRig.do() method

Main method for controlling the camera

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
do(action: CameraAction, amount: number, rigComponent?: RigComponent): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  action | [CameraAction](./controls.cameraaction.md) | Action to perform |
|  amount | number | Amount to move/rotate/etc |
|  rigComponent | [RigComponent](./controls.rigcomponent.md) | Override the default component to perform the action on |
